reviewText: I was surprised at just how good this is!  Dr. Mounce's intended student is a person who has no or very little knowledge of Biblical Greek.  His teaching is easy to follow and apply and gives a good "basic" understanding of the language.  You won't be reading a great deal of ancient Greek manuscripts when you have finished the course, but you will better understand the ancient Greek language better will make the study of the Bible more interesting and applicable to life in the 21st century!
